description.name: PU 4.00-4 Wheel Flat Tyre
description.long_desc:
A full wheel 4.00-4 with a smooth SLICK tread, equipped with ball bearings with an inner diameter of 20 mm. Designed for use in agricultural hay wrappers—balers.


Technical Specifications:


Size: 4.00-4


Tread: Smooth SLICK type


Hub Diameter: 20 mm


Tire Width: 100 mm


Wheel Diameter: 285 mm


Bearings: Ball bearings


Maximum Load: 80 kg

category.name: Angle Grinders
category.path: Power Tools\Angle Grinders and Metal Processing\Angle Grinders

category_idosell.path: Power Tools\Angle Grinders and Metal Processing\Angle Grinders

description.name: Dust cover for angle grinder 115-125mm
description.long_desc:
The dust cover for the angle grinder is the ideal solution for those who value cleanliness and precision during work. Made from durable powder-coated steel, it guarantees long life and resistance to damage. With adjustable cutting depth, the user can tailor the cover to individual needs and working conditions.


The cover is equipped with a dust extraction function, which allows for effective removal of dust generated during cutting, significantly improving visibility and work comfort. It is compatible with angle grinders with disc diameters of 115 mm and 125 mm, making it versatile and compatible with the most popular grinder models.


An additional advantage is the underside of the cover, lined with special sliders that ensure smooth movement during cutting. This solution allows for precise and controlled cutting of materials, minimizing the risk of damage to the working surface.


Product Features:



  • Made of powder-coated steel for durability and resistance.

  • Adjustable cutting depth for greater control.

  • Equipped with a dust extraction system for a cleaner working environment.

  • Compatible with angle grinders with disc diameters of 115 mm and 125 mm.

  • Sliders on the underside of the cover ensure smooth and precise cutting.

description.name: 45 degree chamfering attachment for angle grinder 115-125mm
description.long_desc:
The angle grinder attachment is a robust tool that ensures precise 45° angle cuts, ideal for professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Made from durable powder-coated steel, it is resistant to mechanical damage and corrosion, guaranteeing a long product life.


The angle grinder attachment is indispensable for tiling and renovation work, where precision and speed of angle cutting are required. It is the perfect solution for professional construction companies and DIY enthusiasts.


Key product features:



  • Solid construction: Made from high-quality powder-coated steel, resistant to harsh working conditions.

  • 45° angle cuts: Specifically designed for precise 45° angle cuts, ideal for working with tiles and other building materials.

  • Precise adjustment: Allows for accurate adjustment of the cutting distance from the edge of the material, increasing work precision.

  • Dust extraction function: Equipped with a dust extraction system that ensures a clean work area and better visibility during cutting.

  • Compatibility: The attachment is compatible with angle grinders with disc diameters of 115 mm and 125 mm, making it a versatile tool.

  • Smooth feed: The bottom part of the attachment is equipped with sliders that ensure smooth and even movement during cutting.

  • Easy installation: The attachment offers quick and easy installation on the angle grinder, allowing you to start working immediately

description.name: Waterproof work gloves size 8 /polyester – latex/
description.long_desc:
Professional work gloves engineered for superior comfort and protection, especially during demanding work conditions. Made from a durable blend of polyester and latex, they provide unmatched water resistance, making them ideal for use in wet and humid environments.



  • Water Protection: High water resistance allows work in moist conditions without risking soaked hands.

  • Wearing Comfort: The polyester blend material ensures durability and comfort for extended wear.

  • Wrist Cuff: The elastic cuff holds gloves securely in place, reducing the need for constant adjustments.

  • Safety: Compliance with EN 388 (2121) standards guarantees basic protection against abrasion, cuts, tears, and punctures.

  • Grip Assurance: The latex coating enables a stable grip on tools and materials, minimizing the risk of slipping.

  • Elastic Cuff: The elastic cuff finish prevents gloves from slipping during tasks.

  • Comfortable and Flexible


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Size: 8

  • Material: Polyester, latex

  • Protection Standard: EN 388 (2121)

  • Water Resistance: Yes

  • Color: Blue

  • Finish: Elastic cuff

Professional work gloves engineered for superior comfort and protection, especially during demanding work conditions. Made from a durable blend of polyester and latex, they provide unmatched water resistance, making them ideal for use in wet and humid environments.



  • Water Protection: High water resistance allows work in moist conditions without risking soaked hands.

  • Wearing Comfort: The polyester blend material ensures durability and comfort for extended wear.

  • Wrist Cuff: The elastic cuff holds gloves securely in place, reducing the need for constant adjustments.

  • Safety: Compliance with EN 388 (2121) standards guarantees basic protection against abrasion, cuts, tears, and punctures.

  • Grip Assurance: The latex coating enables a stable grip on tools and materials, minimizing the risk of slipping.

  • Elastic Cuff: The elastic cuff finish prevents gloves from slipping during tasks.

  • Comfortable and Flexible

  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Size: 11

  • Material: Polyester, latex

  • Protection Standard: EN 388 (2121)

  • Water Resistance: Yes

  • Color: Blue

  • Finish: Elastic cuff

description.name: Waterproof thermal winter work gloves size 8 /cotton – latex/
description.long_desc:
These heavy-duty winter gloves offer maximum comfort and protection in cold and damp conditions. Made with high-quality polyester knit, warm cotton, and coated with a smooth, waterproof latex layer, they guarantee effective insulation, durability, and abrasion resistance.


Indispensable for snow clearing and outdoor tasks in freezing temperatures.



  • Thermal Insulation: The warm cotton layer provides thermal insulation, making these gloves ideal for work in freezing conditions.

  • Water Protection: The waterproof latex coating effectively guards against moisture, keeping hands dry even when working in rain or snow.

  • Durability and Abrasion Resistance: Sturdy materials and robust construction ensure long-lasting resistance even under intensive use.

  • Fit and Comfort: The elastic cuff provides a secure fit around the wrist, preventing the gloves from slipping during work.

  • Safety: Compliance with EN 388 (2121) ensures a basic level of protection against abrasion, cuts, tearing, and punctures.

  • Elastic Cuff Finish: Prevents slipping during tasks.

  • Comfortable and Flexible

  • Warm and Durable


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Size: 8

  • Material: Polyester knit, cotton, latex

  • Protection Standard: EN 388 (2121)

  • Water Resistance: Yes

  • Coating: Smooth, waterproof latex

  • Color: Blue

  • Finish: Elastic cuff

  • Cotton Insulation: Ideal for work in freezing temperatures

description.name: Router for wood with 710W with power adjustment
description.long_desc:
An upper spindle router is a precise and versatile tool, ideal for both DIY enthusiasts and professionals working with wood. Thanks to its power and functionality, it allows for advanced milling tasks to be performed with high accuracy.


Technical Specifications:


Power: 710W


Speed Adjustment: 16,000 – 35,000 RPM


Collet Sizes: 1/4", 6 mm, 8 mm


Power Supply: 230V


Features and Benefits:




  • Efficient 710W Motor
    Ensures smooth and stable operation, enabling the processing of various materials, including wood, MDF boards, or plywood.




  • Speed Adjustment
    A range of 16,000 – 35,000 RPM allows precise speed customization to suit the specific task at hand.




  • Complete Set of Router Bits
    The set includes 5 router bits for diverse cuts and grooves, perfect for profiling, grooving, or rounding edges.




  • Universal Collets
    Includes collets in sizes 1/4", 6 mm, and 8 mm, enabling compatibility with a variety of router bits.




  • Dust Shield
    Enhances work comfort by minimizing the spread of dust and wood chips.




  • Adjustable Cutting Depth
    Allows precise depth customization to match the specifics of the task.




  • Robust Construction
    An aluminum housing ensures durability and reliability of the tool.




  • Ergonomic Handle
    Comfortable to hold, designed for extended use without causing hand fatigue.




Applications:


The router is perfectly suited for:




  • Edge Profiling
    Ideal for edges of furniture, shelves, countertops, or frames.




  • Creating Grooves and Slots
    Excellent for panels, wood, or other materials.




  • Customizing DIY Projects
    Perfect for decorations or finishing elements.




  • Precise Milling for Hinges or Handles
    Ensures accurate holes for professional finishes.

description.name: 12/24V 3Ah-200Ah LCD battery tester
description.long_desc:
The Geko LCD Tester is an advanced device designed for quick and precise testing of car batteries with voltages of 12V and 24V and capacities ranging from 3Ah to 200Ah. Equipped with a clear LCD display, it allows for instant reading of results and accurate assessment of the battery's condition. Thanks to its long measurement cables with durable alligator clamps, the tester is easy to use and ensures a stable connection with the tested battery. Whether you are a professional or a DIY enthusiast, this device is perfect for any battery check.


Key product features:



  • Wide compatibility range – The tester supports batteries with capacities from 3Ah to 200Ah, making it a universal tool for both smaller motorcycle batteries and larger car batteries.

  • Supports 12V and 24V batteries – An ideal solution for a wide range of vehicles, including cars, trucks, motorcycles, and agricultural vehicles.

  • Precise measurements – The tester measures not only the battery's condition in percentage terms but also its internal resistance, allowing for an accurate assessment of the battery's actual condition and lifespan prediction.

  • Estimated discharge current function – This feature lets the user know how quickly the battery will discharge under load, which is very useful for diagnosing charging problems.

  • Long measurement cables – 650 mm cables with sturdy alligator clamps ensure easy connection even in hard-to-reach places.


Examples of use:



  • Car battery diagnostics – The tester is ideal for assessing the condition of batteries in both cars and trucks.

  • Motorcycle battery testing – With its support for smaller battery capacities, the tester is also perfect for use with motorcycles and scooters.

  • Workshop use – A professional tool for mechanics that allows for quick and accurate testing of a customer's battery.

  • Home use – Useful for any driver who wants to monitor their vehicle's battery condition independently and avoid unexpected starting issues.


Technical specifications:


Device type: Battery tester


Supported battery capacities: 3Ah-200Ah


Battery voltage: 12V/24V


Cable length: 650 mm


Connectors: Alligator clamps


Functions: Battery condition check (percentage), internal resistance measurement, estimated discharge current determination


Display: 2.7-inch LCD

description.name: 9pcs wobble extension set 1/4" 3/8" 1/2" CrV
description.long_desc:
This set of robust swivel extensions is an indispensable tool in any workshop, garage, or DIY toolbox. Made of the highest quality chrome-vanadium steel (Cr-V), they are characterized by exceptional durability, corrosion resistance, and reliability. Thanks to the swivel design, working with sockets in hard-to-reach places becomes much easier and more efficient. The set is ideal for automotive, mechanical, locksmith workshops, installation work, and for any DIY enthusiast who values solid tools.


Key features:



  • Strength and durability: Made of high-quality chrome-vanadium steel (Cr-V), resistant to corrosion.

  • Functionality: The swivel design allows for angled work in hard-to-reach places.

  • Versatility: The set includes extensions with three popular drive sizes: 1/4", 3/8", and 1/2".

  • Complete set: As many as 9 extensions of various lengths, allowing for adaptation to many applications.

  • Convenient storage: The whole set is placed in a practical foam insert, perfectly fitting a tool cart.

  • Precise workmanship: Guarantees a precise fit and secure connection with sockets.


Technical specifications:



  • Material: Chrome-vanadium steel (Cr-V)

  • Drive sizes (square sizes): 1/4", 3/8", 1/2"

  • Number of pieces in the set: 9

  • Extension sizes:

    • 1/4": 50 mm, 100 mm, 250 mm

    • 3/8": 75 mm, 150 mm, 250 mm

    • 1/2": 50 mm, 125 mm, 250 mm



  • Insert dimensions: 28 x 17 cm

  • Applications: Automotive, mechanical, locksmith workshops, installation work, DIY

description.name: Waterproof thermal winter work gloves size 11 /cotton – latex/
description.long_desc:
These heavy-duty winter gloves offer maximum comfort and protection in cold and damp conditions. Made with high-quality polyester knit, warm cotton, and coated with a smooth, waterproof latex layer, they guarantee effective insulation, durability, and abrasion resistance.


Indispensable for snow clearing and outdoor tasks in freezing temperatures.



  • Thermal Insulation: The warm cotton layer provides thermal insulation, making these gloves ideal for work in freezing conditions.

  • Water Protection: The waterproof latex coating effectively guards against moisture, keeping hands dry even when working in rain or snow.

  • Durability and Abrasion Resistance: Sturdy materials and robust construction ensure long-lasting resistance even under intensive use.

  • Fit and Comfort: The elastic cuff provides a secure fit around the wrist, preventing the gloves from slipping during work.

  • Safety: Compliance with EN 388 (2121) ensures a basic level of protection against abrasion, cuts, tearing, and punctures.

  • Elastic Cuff Finish: Prevents slipping during tasks.

  • Comfortable and Flexible

  • Warm and Durable


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Size: 11

  • Material: Polyester knit, cotton, latex

  • Protection Standard: EN 388 (2121)

  • Water Resistance: Yes

  • Coating: Smooth, waterproof latex

  • Color: Blue

  • Finish: Elastic cuff

  • Cotton Insulation: Ideal for work in freezing temperatures

description.name: Magnetic telescopis holder 130-635mm "pen" - type – display box
description.long_desc:
The "pen" type telescopic magnetic pick-up tool is the perfect instrument for working in hard-to-reach places. Its compact, pen-like design makes it handy and convenient for everyday use. With its telescopic design, the length of the tool can be adjusted from 130 mm to 635 mm, allowing for easy retrieval of metal objects in tight spaces, such as engines, workshop corners, or behind furniture. The built-in strong magnet ensures secure attraction and easy collection of metal items, such as screws, nuts, or other small parts.


Product features:



  • Compact pen-shaped design with a clip for easy attachment to a pocket

  • Telescopic length adjustment: 130 mm - 635 mm

  • Strong magnet that effectively attracts metal elements

  • Lightweight and easy to use, ideal for everyday workshop tasks and DIY projects


Applications:


The "pen" type telescopic magnetic pick-up tool is useful wherever there is a need to precisely retrieve metal elements from hard-to-reach places. It works perfectly in automotive workshops, machine repair services, production facilities, and even at home when you need to pick up dropped screws or nails from under furniture or appliances. A must-have gadget for any DIY enthusiast, mechanic, or technician.

description.name: 9pcs grout tools set
description.long_desc:
9-Piece tiling grouting kit designed for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts, this kit guarantees high quality, precision, and user comfort, allowing you to achieve a perfectly clean, aesthetically pleasing finish.


A comprehensive tool set that provides complete support at every stage of tiling work, from grout preparation and application to final cleaning. With extended kit elements, the work becomes more convenient and efficient.


The kit includes:




  1. 24-Liter Bucket




    • Sturdy and durable bucket made from resilient plastic, resistant to cracking and damage.




    • Ergonomic handle with holes ensures a comfortable grip during transport.




    • A 24-liter capacity allows for extended work without the need to refill frequently.









    • The bucket has additional wheels, making it easy to move around the work area, even when fully loaded.








    • With the mobile bucket, work is less tiring, and access to water and tools is always within reach.







  1. Grouting Float with Thermoplastic Rubber (280 x 140 mm)




    • Equipped with flexible thermoplastic rubber, ensuring even grout application and gap filling.




    • Dimensions (280 x 140 mm) provide convenient control and precision during grout application.




    • Ergonomic handle enhances comfort and minimizes hand fatigue.






  2. High-Absorption Sponge Float (280 x 140 mm)




    • Features a high-absorption sponge, ideal for removing excess grout and cleaning tiles.




    • Dimensions of 280 x 140 mm allow for effective cleaning and leave the tile surfaces aesthetically clean.




    • Sturdy handle ensures comfortable use, even with repeated squeezing of the sponge.






  3. Soft Tiling Sponge (175 x 100 x 50 mm)




    • High-quality soft sponge ideal for final cleaning and removing grout residue.




    • Its compact dimensions make it easy to handle and gentle on tile surfaces.




    • Leaves no streaks or scratches, which is especially important for the finishing touches.






  4. Plastic Grid for Excess Water Removal




    • A durable grid allows convenient water extraction from sponges and floats, maintaining optimal tool moisture.




    • Placed inside the bucket, it provides stable support when removing excess water.






  5. Rollers for Squeezing Excess Water from Sponge Float




    • Roller system in the bucket allows quick water removal from the float, facilitating surface cleaning.




    • Made from durable material, the rollers ensure long-lasting functionality and ease of use.






  6. Mortar Mixer (400 x 80 mm)




    • Robust mortar mixer, 400 mm long and 80 mm wide, makes grout preparation quick and efficient.




    • The appropriate dimensions ensure effective mixing, achieving the ideal grout consistency.






  7. Notched Trowel (280 x 130 mm) with 10 x 10 mm Teeth




    • A notched trowel (280 x 130 mm) with 10 x 10 mm teeth is ideal for evenly applying grout.




    • The teeth ensure optimal material distribution, essential for tile installation.




    • Ergonomic handle guarantees comfort, while the sturdy trowel construction resists damage, performing excellently during prolonged work.






Why Choose the Expanded Tiling Grouting Kit?


This kit is designed for maximum efficiency and ease of use. With high-quality tools, grouting work becomes quick, precise, and enjoyable. The bucket with a grid and rollers facilitates handling, solving the problem of excess water and resulting in more precise and aesthetically pleasing surface finishes. Floats and sponges adapted to various tiling stages allow for comprehensive completion of the entire process—from grout application to cleaning and final finishing.


Enhanced with additional elements like bucket wheels, mortar mixer, and notched trowel, this kit offers even greater convenience and versatility for tiling work.

    • Equipped with flexible thermoplastic rubber, ensuring even grout application and gap filling.




    • Dimensions (280 x 140 mm) provide convenient control and precision during grout application.




    • Ergonomic handle enhances comfort and minimizes hand fatigue.






  2. High-Absorption Sponge Float (280 x 140 mm)




    • Features a high-absorption sponge, ideal for removing excess grout and cleaning tiles.




    • Dimensions of 280 x 140 mm allow for effective cleaning and leave the tile surfaces aesthetically clean.




    • Sturdy handle ensures comfortable use, even with repeated squeezing of the sponge.






  3. Soft Tiling Sponge (175 x 100 x 50 mm)




    • High-quality soft sponge ideal for final cleaning and removing grout residue.




    • Its compact dimensions make it easy to handle and gentle on tile surfaces.




    • Leaves no streaks or scratches, which is especially important for the finishing touches.






  4. Plastic Grid for Excess Water Removal




    • A durable grid allows convenient water extraction from sponges and floats, maintaining optimal tool moisture.




    • Placed inside the bucket, it provides stable support when removing excess water.






  5. Rollers for Squeezing Excess Water from Sponge Float




    • Roller system in the bucket allows quick water removal from the float, facilitating surface cleaning.




    • Made from durable material, the rollers ensure long-lasting functionality and ease of use.






  6. Mortar Mixer (400 x 80 mm)




    • Robust mortar mixer, 400 mm long and 80 mm wide, makes grout preparation quick and efficient.




    • The appropriate dimensions ensure effective mixing, achieving the ideal grout consistency.






  7. Notched Trowel (280 x 130 mm) with 10 x 10 mm Teeth




    • A notched trowel (280 x 130 mm) with 10 x 10 mm teeth is ideal for evenly applying grout.




    • The teeth ensure optimal material distribution, essential for tile installation.




    • Ergonomic handle guarantees comfort, while the sturdy trowel construction resists damage, performing excellently during prolonged work.






Why Choose the Expanded Tiling Grouting Kit?


This kit is designed for maximum efficiency and ease of use. With high-quality tools, grouting work becomes quick, precise, and enjoyable. The bucket with a grid and rollers facilitates handling, solving the problem of excess water and resulting in more precise and aesthetically pleasing surface finishes. Floats and sponges adapted to various tiling stages allow for comprehensive completion of the entire process—from grout application to cleaning and final finishing.


Enhanced with additional elements like bucket wheels, mortar mixer, and notched trowel, this kit offers even greater convenience and versatility for tiling work.

description.name: 6pcs grout tools set
description.long_desc:
The 6-piece tiling grouting kit is a professional tool set that simplifies grouting, cleaning, and finishing tile surfaces. Designed for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts, it ensures high quality, precision, and user comfort, helping achieve a perfectly clean, aesthetically pleasing finish. This solution is designed for a comprehensive approach to the grouting process, from applying grout to the precise cleaning of tiles.


The kit includes:




  1. 24-Liter Bucket




    • Made from durable plastic, resistant to cracking and mechanical damage.




    • An ergonomic handle with holes provides a comfortable grip and stability during transport, even when fully loaded with water.






  2. Grouting Float with Thermoplastic Rubber (280 x 140 mm)




    • Equipped with a smooth, flexible thermoplastic rubber that allows even and precise application of grout on tile surfaces.




    • The dimensions (280 x 140 mm) ensure optimal control over the amount of grout applied and even filling of the gaps between tiles.




    • The float handle is ergonomic and fits well in the hand, enhancing work comfort and reducing fatigue during prolonged use.






  3. High-Absorption Sponge Float (280 x 140 mm)




    • This float features a specially designed sponge with a high absorption level, effectively collecting excess water and grout.




    • The sponge dimensions (280 x 140 mm) make it ideal for cleaning tile surfaces after grouting, removing grout residues, and leaving the surface clean and polished.






  4. Soft Tiling Sponge (175 x 100 x 50 mm)




    • The soft sponge (175 x 100 x 50 mm) is ideal for the final stage of surface cleaning.




    • Its high-quality material offers excellent absorbency and gentleness for surfaces, ensuring it removes any residues without scratching.




    • The sponge works well for final polishing, giving the tiles a flawless appearance.






  5. Plastic Grid for Excess Water Removal




    • Made of durable plastic, the grid is ideal for convenient water extraction from sponges and floats.




    • Its design ensures efficient drainage, preventing over-wetting of tools and making surface cleaning easier.




    • The grid is mounted on high legs inside the bucket.






  6. Rollers for Sponge Float Water Removal




    • Special rollers installed in the bucket are used for thoroughly squeezing excess water from the sponge float, maintaining the optimal moisture level of the tool during cleaning.




    • The roller mechanism allows for quick and effective water removal, particularly useful for tasks requiring repeated cleaning.






Why Choose the Tiling Grouting Kit?


This kit is designed for maximum efficiency and ease of use. With high-quality tools, grouting becomes quick, precise, and enjoyable. The bucket with a grid and rollers provides easy handling, eliminating excess water issues, which results in a more precise and aesthetically pleasing surface finish. The floats and sponges are tailored for various tiling stages, allowing for comprehensive completion of the entire process—from grout application to cleaning and final finishing.

description.name: Venting roller 230x100x28mm
description.long_desc:
A roller measuring 230x100x28 for screed de-airing is an essential tool that ensures an excellent finish for concrete surfaces and self-leveling screeds.


Why use a de-airing roller for screeds?


Because it effectively removes air bubbles from the screed, preventing micro-damage and unevenness that could weaken the floor structure and affect its appearance. Proper de-airing results in a smooth surface, providing better adhesion for subsequent layers like tiles, parquet, or panels.


Using a de-airing roller significantly increases the durability and strength of the substrate, eliminating the risk of air voids that could lead to cracks in the future. A roller with a width of 230 mm and a diameter of 100 mm, equipped with 28 mm spikes, is ideal for larger surfaces, allowing for quick and efficient work.

description.name: 2pcs spout venting set
description.long_desc:
A screed venting kit is a complete set of tools essential for the professional finishing of screed surfaces, ensuring perfect smoothness without air bubbles. The kit includes a venting roller with a working width of 230 mm, a diameter of 100 mm, and spikes 28 mm in length, as well as special spiked shoes that allow safe movement on freshly poured surfaces.


With the venting roller, which effectively removes air bubbles from the mixture, you achieve a smooth and durable surface, minimizing the risk of voids or cracks. The 28 mm spikes on the roller ensure thorough penetration of the screed, enabling even venting and eliminating the possibility of defects and unevenness.


Additionally, the kit includes spiked shoes specifically designed for walking on freshly poured screed without causing deformations or marks. They allow you to comfortably and safely vent and level the surface, attending to every detail.

description.name: Convector heater with thermostat 2000W (black)
description.long_desc:
The SMDL01A electric heater is the perfect solution for cold days, offering fast heating for rooms of any purpose. Its modern design in elegant black makes it a great fit for any interior, from living rooms and bedrooms to offices. Solid construction from high-quality materials ensures durability and reliable operation. The heater is equipped with a manual thermostat with smooth adjustment, allowing for precise temperature control to meet your needs.


Product Features:




  • High-quality construction – The SMDL01A heater is designed with durability and reliability in mind. The casing is made of high-quality scratch-resistant steel, and the heating elements ensure a long lifespan. Additionally, the elegant matte surface not only looks good but is also easy to clean.




  • 3 heating levels – The heater offers three modes: 750 W, 1250 W, and 2000 W. This allows you to easily adjust the power to suit the room’s needs – lower power is perfect for warming small spaces, while the maximum power quickly raises the temperature in larger rooms.




  • Manual thermostat with smooth temperature adjustment – The user has full control over the temperature, allowing for optimal warmth at all times. The smooth adjustment feature allows for precise temperature setting, contributing to energy savings.




  • Mobility and convenience – With ergonomic handles, the heater is easy to move around. You can take it to any room that requires additional heating, and when not in use, it can be easily stored away. An additional advantage is the option to mount it on the wall, saving valuable floor space.




  • Overheat protection – The heater is equipped with a modern protection system that automatically shuts off the device if it overheats, ensuring safe operation and protecting the household from fire risk.




  • Quiet operation – The SMDL01A operates almost silently, making it an ideal choice for spaces where peace and quiet are important, such as bedrooms, children's rooms, or offices.




Example Uses:


The SMDL01A electric heater is suitable for various situations:




  • Supplemental home heating – If central heating isn’t enough, or if you have rooms that are not regularly heated, such as garages, porches, or basements, this heater will be the perfect solution.




  • Home office – During winter months, having an additional heat source in a home office can increase work comfort by providing the right temperature without needing to heat the entire house.




  • Heating during heating system failures – In unexpected situations where the central heating system fails, the SMDL01A quickly heats up rooms, ensuring warmth and comfort.




  • Guest rooms – If you have guests and want them to feel comfortable, even in unheated rooms, this heater will quickly raise the temperature and create a cozy atmosphere.




  • Bedroom – The heater’s quiet operation makes it an ideal choice for bedrooms, where both the right temperature and noise-free operation are important for a good night’s sleep.




  • Vacation homes – On cooler days, the heater works perfectly in vacation homes, which often lack permanent heating systems, allowing you to quickly warm up the space.




Technical Specifications:


Model: SMDL01A


Color: Black


Power: 750 / 1250 / 2000 W


Thermostat: Manual, with smooth temperature adjustment


Portable: Yes


Wall-mountable: Yes


Height: 33.5 cm (38.5 cm with installed legs)


Width: 53.5 cm


Depth: 11 cm

description.name: Convector heater with remote and LCD display
description.long_desc:
Convector Heater 2300W with Wi-Fi and Turbo Function – Comfortable Warmth at Your Fingertips!


Introduce modern heating solutions to your home with the 2300W convector heater, providing fast and efficient heating for rooms of various sizes. With a range of features such as precise temperature control, a built-in thermostat, and integrated Wi-Fi, this heater is an ideal choice for those who value convenience and smart solutions.


Main Features of the Product:




  • 2300W Power – Efficient and Fast Heating
    With 2300W of power, the heater can quickly raise the temperature even in large rooms, providing instant warmth and comfort. It is an ideal solution for quickly heating up your space, especially during chilly winter evenings. The powerful heating element means that the device can be used as the main source of heat or as a supplement to your existing heating system.




  • Precise Temperature Control – Adjust the Heat to Your Needs
    Using the intuitive control panel, you can accurately set the desired temperature to within one degree. The heater will maintain your chosen heat level, ensuring comfort while also saving energy. The precise adjustment allows you to tailor the device's operation to changing conditions, making it highly practical for different spaces – from bedrooms to offices.




  • Built-in Thermostat – Automatic Temperature Maintenance
    The thermostat is key to the energy-efficient operation of the heater. Once the desired temperature is reached, the heater automatically reduces or turns off the power, helping to avoid excessive energy consumption. This feature allows the heater to work intelligently, adjusting its power to current conditions, which significantly reduces heating costs.




  • Programmable Timer – Convenience and Time Savings
    The timer allows you to schedule the heater to turn on or off at a convenient time, which is perfect for preparing a cozy warmth before you return home or ensuring the heater shuts off automatically after a set period. This scheduling option allows for daily optimization of the device's operation, limiting energy consumption costs.




  • Wi-Fi Module – Remote Control via App
    The Wi-Fi module allows you to fully control the heater using your smartphone, which is an invaluable convenience for everyday use. Thanks to compatibility with a mobile app, you can set the temperature, turn the device on or off, and schedule its operation from anywhere – at home, at work, or on vacation. Remote management not only offers convenience but also optimal energy use.




  • Intuitive Control Panel with LCD Display – Readability and Ease of Use
    The large, backlit LCD display and clear control panel make configuring settings extremely simple, even for those with little experience with such devices. The display allows you to monitor the current temperature, mode, and timer settings, providing full control over the heater's operation.




  • Remote Control – Comfort Without Getting Up
    The heater comes with a remote control, allowing you to manage the device from anywhere in the room. You can adjust the temperature, turn the heater on or off, and activate the Turbo function using the remote. This is a great solution for enjoying the comfort of warmth without having to approach the device.




  • Turbo Function – Built-In Fan for Quick Heating
    With the built-in fan, the heater can immediately supply hot air, speeding up the room heating process. The Turbo function is perfect when you need to heat the space quickly, such as after returning from a winter walk. Rapid heat distribution ensures even warming of the room, allowing you to enjoy warmth in just a few minutes.



  • Modern and Elegant Design
    The heater features a modern design that fits well in both classic and contemporary interiors. Its compact and slim build allows it to be placed anywhere in the room, and its lightweight construction makes it easy to move around. The neutral color finish makes it blend seamlessly with the room decor without disrupting its aesthetics.


  • Safe Use – Overheating Protection
    The heater is equipped with advanced safety features to protect against overheating. Automatic shut-off in case of excessive temperature guarantees safe use of the device in any room, including those with children or pets.




  • Quiet Operation – Comfort All Day Long
    Despite its high power, the heater operates quietly, making it ideal for use in bedrooms, offices, or children's rooms. The lack of noise during operation ensures maximum comfort, without disturbing sleep or daily activities.




The 2300W convector heater is an ideal solution for both home and office use. With the Turbo function and precise temperature control, it is perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, and even children's rooms, where fast and safe heating is important. The Wi-Fi module allows you to turn on the heating before arriving home, ensuring warmth the moment you walk in. The timer makes it excellent for warming an office during working hours, saving energy after hours.


Technical Specifications:


Input Voltage: 230V AC


Frequency: ~50 Hz


Heating Power: 1000 / 1300 / 2300W


Control: Manual / Remote


Temperature Control Range: 5 – 37°C


Mounting Type: Wall-mounted / Free-standing


Heating Type: Convection


Display: LCD


Recommended Room Size: 25 m2


Protection Class: Class I


IP Protection: None


Power Cord Length: 1.5 m


Net Weight: 2.9 kg

description.name: Glass convector heater with LCD, remote control and WiFi 2500W (white)
description.long_desc:
Electric Heater 2500W with Wi-Fi Module and Remote Control – Stylish Heating for Any Season!


This modern 2500W electric heater combines elegance with functionality. With its tempered glass front and minimalist design, it will become a stylish addition to any interior. Perfect for both homes and offices, it provides efficient heating and user comfort thanks to advanced features such as a built-in Wi-Fi module and remote control.


Key Product Features:



  • Heating Power 2500W – The heater provides quick and efficient heating for rooms up to 25 m2, making it ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, offices, and other spaces.

  • White Color – An elegant, neutral color that perfectly complements modern interiors, adding style to the decor.

  • Modern Design – The tempered glass front emphasizes the contemporary look of the device, while being easy to clean and scratch-resistant.

  • Clear LED Display and Intuitive Control Panel – These allow for easy and precise temperature settings and monitoring of the heater's operation. With large, bright numbers on the display, the heater is simple and convenient to use.

  • Built-in Wi-Fi Module – Enables remote control of the heater via smartphone, enhancing user comfort. You can adjust the temperature from anywhere, even when you’re away from home.

  • Remote Control Included – A convenient feature that lets you control the device without needing to approach the panel, increasing everyday ease of use.

  • Wall-Mountable or Freestanding – The heater offers flexible installation options. You can mount it on the wall to save space or set it on stable feet, which are included in the package.

  • Built-in Thermostat and Timer – Automatically adjusts the heating power to the desired temperature, providing efficient heating without wasting energy. The timer allows you to set the heater’s on and off times for added convenience in daily use.

  • Precise Temperature Control – Allows for exact temperature settings to ensure optimal thermal comfort, regardless of weather or external conditions.


Suggested Uses:


The 2500W electric heater is an excellent solution for:



  • Living Rooms and Bedrooms – Thanks to its elegant design and wall-mounting option, it fits perfectly into the interior décor while providing pleasant warmth on cooler days.

  • Offices and Workspaces – Precise temperature control and remote operation features allow for comfortable working conditions, enhancing productivity.

  • Vacation Homes or Apartments – With remote control via Wi-Fi, you can prepare the room before your arrival, enjoying warmth as soon as you step in.


Ensure warmth and comfort in your home with a modern heater that combines innovation with elegant design!


Technical Specifications:


Input Voltage: 230V AC


Frequency: ~50 Hz


Heating Power: 1250 / 2500W


Color: White


Control: Manual / Remote


Temperature Range: 5 - 50°C


Mounting Options: Wall-mounted / Freestanding


Heating Type: Convection


Display: LED


Recommended Room Size: 25m2


Protection Class: Class I


IP Rating: IP24


Cable Length: 1.5 m


Net Weight: 7.9 kg
